text:
「挑戰者。」
「妳說了個好詞彙，當然也可以用比較不好聽的說法，受虐狂，我不避諱妳這樣理解喔。」
「怪人，啊哈哈，確實是的。」
「不過不過，就算是怪人，正因為美少女的外貌具有迷惑性，穿著奇裝異服也不會讓人反感，妳才會如此好奇，而不是嫌惡地拉開距離，不是嗎？」
隱隱的震動聲。
trans:
"Challenger."
"That’s a fitting word, but you could also describe it in less flattering terms—masochist. I don’t mind you interpreting it that way."
"Weirdo, haha, I suppose that’s true."
"But even so, just because you’re a weirdo, the charm of a beautiful girl’s appearance can be misleading. Wearing eccentric outfits doesn’t provoke aversion, but rather curiosity. Isn’t that right?"
A faint vibration could be heard.
